mapper.select: SELECT sum(a.asset_num) asset_num, sum(a.normal_num) normal_num, sum(a.asset_num)-sum(a.normal_num) abnormal_num FROM ( ( SELECT 0 asset_num, count( 1 ) normal_num FROM ( eam_asset ea LEFT JOIN eam_gateway_asset ega ON ea.asset_id = ega.asset_id ) LEFT JOIN eam_gateway eg ON ega.gateway_id = eg.gateway_id LEFT JOIN eam_asset_status eas ON ea.iot_num = eas.tag_id LEFT JOIN sys_area sa ON sa.`code` = eg.address_id WHERE 1 = 1 -- AND sa.city_code = '130400000000' AND eas.receive_time > '2020-7-4 00:00:00' ) UNION ( SELECT count( 1 ) asset_num, 0 normal_num FROM eam_asset ea WHERE ea.iot_num IS NOT NULL ) ) a

SELECT a.city_code, max( city_name ) name, sum( iot_sum ) value FROM ( SELECT sa.CODE city_code, sa.NAME city_name, 0 iot_sum FROM sys_area sa WHERE sa.parent_code = 13 UNION ( SELECT sa.parent_code city_code, '' city_name, count( 1 ) iot_sum FROM ( eam_asset ea LEFT JOIN eam_gateway_asset ega ON ea.asset_id = ega.asset_id ) LEFT JOIN eam_gateway eg ON ega.gateway_id = eg.gateway_id LEFT JOIN sys_area sa ON sa.`code` = eg.address_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( iot_num IS NOT NULL ) ) ) a GROUP BY a.city_code

SELECT eam_asset.iot_num AS `物联网标签号`, eam_asset.asset_tag AS `资产标签号`, eam_asset.asset_name AS `资产名称`, eam_asset.asset_class AS `资产类别`, eam_asset.productor AS `生产厂商`, eam_asset.supplier AS `供应商`, eam_asset.model AS `规格型号`, eam_asset.asset_num 资产编号, eam_asset.lifeInMonth AS `折旧剩余月数`, eam_asset.lifeInYears AS `折旧年限`, eam_asset.dutyName AS `责任人名称`, eam_asset.userName AS `使用人名称`, eam_asset.dutyDeptName AS `责任部门`, eam_asset.`实物管理部门`, eam_asset.addressName 资产地点, eam_asset.base_station_name 综资站点名称, eam_asset.cost 原值, eam_asset.netValue 净值, eam_asset.residualValue 残值 FROM eam_asset

SELECT eam_asset.iot_num AS `物联网标签号`, eam_asset.asset_tag AS `资产标签号`, eam_asset.asset_name AS `资产名称`, eam_asset.asset_type AS `资产种类`, eam_asset.class_code AS `类别编码`, eam_asset.asset_class AS `资产类别`, eam_asset.productor AS `生产厂商`, eam_asset.supplier AS `供应商`, eam_asset.model AS `规格型号`, eam_asset.`序列号`, eam_asset.asset_num 资产编号, eam_asset.`应用领域编码`, eam_asset.`应用领域名称`, eam_asset.lifeInMonth AS `折旧剩余月数`, eam_asset.lifeInYears AS `折旧年限`, eam_asset.`是否重要资产`, eam_asset.`备注`, eam_asset.`erp创建时间`, eam_asset.amount AS `数量`, eam_asset.`计量单位`, eam_asset.`传输线路资源量`, eam_asset.`传输线路资源量单位`, eam_asset.`资产状态`, eam_asset.`资产子状态`, eam_asset.dutyCode AS `责任人编码`, eam_asset.dutyName AS `责任人名称`, eam_asset.userCode AS `使用人编码`, eam_asset.userName AS `使用人名称`, eam_asset.`责任部门编码`, eam_asset.dutyDeptName AS `责任部门`, eam_asset.`实物管理部门编码`, eam_asset.`实物管理部门`, eam_asset.addressCode 资产地点编码, eam_asset.addressName 资产地点, eam_asset.base_station_code 综资站点编码, eam_asset.base_station_name 综资站点名称, eam_asset.`对应综资站点状态`, eam_asset.`基站/营业厅/仓库编码`, eam_asset.`基站/营业厅/仓库`, eam_asset.`责任人确认`, eam_asset.`使用人确认`, eam_asset.`是否共享设备`, eam_asset.`是否共建设备`, eam_asset.startDate 启用日期, eam_asset.`合同编号`, eam_asset.`租金`, eam_asset.`起租日期`, eam_asset.`止租日期/报废日期`, eam_asset.`老资产标签号`, eam_asset.`资产使用状态`, eam_asset.`是否机密`, eam_asset.`购置日期`, eam_asset.cost 原值, eam_asset.netValue 净值, eam_asset.netQuota 净额, eam_asset.residualValue 残值, eam_asset.periodDepreciation 本期折旧额, eam_asset.yearDepreciation 本年折旧额, eam_asset.cumulativeDepreciation 累计折旧额, eam_asset.periodImpairment 本期减值准备, eam_asset.yearImpairment 本年减值准备, eam_asset.cumulativeImpairment 累计减值准备, eam_asset.`网络元素编码`, eam_asset.`网络元素名称`, eam_asset.`投资分类编码`, eam_asset.`投资分类名称`, eam_asset.`业务平台编码`, eam_asset.`业务平台名称`, eam_asset.`网络层次编码`, eam_asset.`网络层次名称`, eam_asset.`支撑网设备类型编码`, eam_asset.`支撑网设备类型名称`, eam_asset.`项目编号`, eam_asset.`项目名称`, eam_asset.`项目小类`, eam_asset.`是否抵扣`, eam_asset.`原规格型号`, eam_asset.image FROM eam_asset
SELECT aa.alarm_time, ea.asset_name, aa.alarm_type, ea.iot_num FROM asset_alarm aa, eam_asset ea WHERE aa.asset_id = ea.asset_id and aa.`status`=0 and aa.alarm_type='丢失'
